header.activity: Colleagues Complaining about Things they do not Like

body.u: so what don't you like about this job?
the hours the shifts working overnight em the rain it's raining what about you?
but you stay inside all the time it's raining

no but when it's raining you can guarantee you've got to be outside most of the shift like somebody will cut their finger or drink too much alcohol or I don't know go crazy what don't you like about your job?
em I don't have a company I work for em I get on alright with most of the guards can be a bit trying sometimes but that's with all people em the students can be a pain
true I didn't mention the students but they can be
that's cos you're being diplomatic
no but sometimes they're alright like they're more alright than not usually
yeah there are some nice ones yeah
em but still doesn't stop me hating the shifts
shifts I'm not too bad about nights not too bad wouldn't mind a few weekends off but it's just one of those
I get a week a weekend off every four weeks so it's not too bad but I always hate the fact that everybody else seems to be working when I'm off
always the way
yeah
I can't remember the last time I've been out
so what do you hate about the students then?
em they're goby mouthed em the lack of respect em their reluctance to just do a simple task like signing this visitors in em mainly being mouthy an unpleasant sometimes
are they the kind of things that annoy you about normal people as well? Like the general public
yeah but the students as well I don't like them lying to me
right
I find lying very disrespectful and I don't do it to them so don't be doing it to me
yeah I hate liars as well like obvious liars as well that you're just like why are you saying that? When it's clearly not true?
yeah and they don't seem to realise that you've been here like a couple of years and you've heard all these lies over and over and over again you're not the first so

yeah not clever not inventive at all sometimes if it's a bit of a more of an inventive lie I think that's quite funny really so what do you hate in general? Like what would be your most hated thing like out of work
out of work em mainly just stupid people
I hate stupid people too
I don't pay fools I don't suffer fools
I hate my neighbours every single one of them
should move
I would do if I could afford it absolutely every one of them especially the guy that got speed bump put put in the road the other day
he got them put it?

well I don't know if it's him but em he mentioned it at the residents meeting that's how weird my neighbours are and all of a sudden we've got three speed bumps to get out the road it's like about a hundred meters it's only a cul-de-sac you can bumps so I hate at number four I don't even know where number four is
I'm going to say it's near the beginning of the close
yeah I've never see number four yeah I still hate him I hate quite a lot of people I'm not a people person you see
so what do you do ? Are they retiling it or are they just going to have that one tile that's ?
why what are they doing?
have you not seen it?
no
well you know as you go in? And you've got the girls on the right and you had that like kiosk thing
yeah

that's all gone the girls all the toilets have been ripped out em I think they're going to retile it but Rob was saying the he doesn't reckon they are cos I've seen packs of tiles in there so I assumed they were going to retile it and then do the same to the boys so I didn't see the point of it it's only what? Another two years on the site?
yeah I would say there's no point in doing anything to the Pav only like maybe like a lick of paint for when the parents come
plus they're only students hardly any of them use it so
no it's only when we have the Pav parties isn't it? And then
in fact they're the ones who make a mess in the place anyway so
yeah usually sick in there and stuff and we get
plus plus the mainly the lads though I don't know what they do some of them can't even flush the toilet it's sad
oh dear it's cos a lot of the time they don't live in the real world that's what it is
maybe they get mummy and daddy to push the toilet for them

I think my brothers would if they could I always think my brothers are kind of almost like the students are here you know that that come in the first year and like mum and dad do everything for them only they're older so it's worse
I don't even like I don't like getting molly cuddled by my mother
I never did cos I was the oldest so I really didn't get much choice
ah I'm the youngest and the only boy
spoilt and the only boy bet you're well spoilt
by my ma yeah I'd say I was I'd say she pampers me too much
how many sisters you got?
three all older all uglier
I'm obviously the most beautiful one of the four of us not really but the boys do get treated lot better than the girls I think but I don't know that's because they're the two youngest
I read em girls get on better with their mums though than lads they seem to have some sort of connection

yeah I don't think my mum realised how lucky she was to have daughters until we both moved out and now I think she wants us to move back in but I'm a bit too old for that really although I'd love to but
you'd have to take your boyfriend with you wouldn't it?
yeah I could leave him at mine move out without him
do that then
what just leave him to his own devices? Wouldn't have a house to go back to if I wanted to
have you noticed that twenty minutes drags

not before you never realised how boring I am before either it's just like I can't believe anybody speaks to me sometimes it's awful trying to think of other things I hate don't like dogs don't like dogs barking don't like the sun
I love the sun
do you?
more sun is what we need
we don't last week was too much
no I get depressed if I don't get sun
ah have you got that SAD thing?
yeah
I've got the opposite of that I don't think it's been discovered yet but I definitely have got the opposite
well she just made it up right I'll just forward
didn't make it up I could say that SAD's made up but they have light boxes and everything of it don't they? So
I don't get them you got a light switch and you need a light box
sit in front of a light
it's still an artificial light at the end of the day
true
the sight of the sun bri well brings me joy where a light that simulates sunlight is excuse me is just a light simulating sunlight
yeah apparently it does make people feel better but
get out more that's what I say or move to somewhere where it's sunny all the time
yeah ah no I couldn't cope it's cos I'm too fair the sun doesn't like me and I don't like it
sun doesn't like me always burns me I'm pretty fair
yeah but
I don't even tan never gone brown in my life
no I don't tan I just look like one big freckle or one big rash depending on what it decides what else don't what else don't you like? I think I'm really miserable so you've got to
I like everything I'm such an outgoing loving person always got a smile on my face
there must be something you really don't like
em
I don't know scousers or something
I've never had a problem with scousers I mean gads can get a bit annoying sometimes but I've never really had anything against scousers just the goby ones the braggers which that's what is but
it's his age as well
yeah but he's still a bragger
can't believe you don't like not like anything
there's loads of things I don't like
go on
I don't like peppers
do you not? That's weird
can't stand it the devil's fruit
all colours of peppers?
Don't like spicy food don't like I don't like certain nationalities of people
that's em
no I don't like the jocks let's face it they don't like me I don't like them
I like people in the north-west and that's almost it it's that kind of thing
even some of those can be annoying
yeah true I'm not a people person is that it?

em I'm not a big fan of R and B cos I don't see it as rhythm and blues maybe rhythm but there's no blues there you can't be singing the blues if some girl's going at you cos you've been cheating on her that is not the blues that's just being cut out for being a naughty boy
I don't like R and B either I don't like anything by Lady Gaga cos she's a nutter she's not even that good what about when you're driving what do you hate when you're driving?
other drivers full stop
other drivers any drivers in particular? Probably drivers that are like me
just anyone who's on the road in front of me why is he just get out my way and I'll be fucking sweet I hate when people at traffic lights the light turns it's like these ones you know on Popper Park?
yeah
right? They're only green for like seconds and I mean literally seconds
yeah they are they're not very long are they?

right? And people are just sat there dozying like there's about five cars length from the car in front of them pulled away and the they decide to pull away so I might squeeze through but there's like five other people who could have got through who didn't get through just cos they're dozy and can't pay attention

yeah I had an accident once because the person in front of me didn't set off as quick as I thought he should of and I ran into the back of him so I think technically I was in the right even though it went down as my fault cos I hit him well he should have been paying attention
I would have hit him in the face soon as he got out the car
it was it was a BSM one a school of motoring thing but it wasn't like a learner so he still can't be forgiven and it was rush hour so you've got to be in a rush
yeah what what's that about let's go ad take somebody em on their first driving lesson right in the middle of rush hour

I don't know I hate learner drivers they've just opened like the new like driving test thing near my house like just round the corner so it's full of learners all the time just like swarming sometimes you can be behind about three or four of them

see I don't actually mind learner drivers I just don't like their instructors taking them out at stupid o'clock in the after or evening when people are trying to get home through rush hour traffic which they're already stressed they've had a long day at work they don't want to
Don't want to be

Don't want to be sat in a car They certainly don't want to be sat behind somebody at a traffic lights who stalls their car like three or four times because some instructor decides oh let's go out on a rush hour and get you all stressed
shouldn't really go out in rush hour until they're like almost ready for the test
yeah
when they're like almost like a normal driver
or if that's the only time they can do it take them down quiet roads don't take them down the busiest roads you can find
yeah I hated learning to drive as well that's another thing I hated cos I found it really difficult cos I'm not a natural driver I hate driving

never looked forward to mine it was coming up to like you know this day and it was like oh got twenty minutes more twent didn't like that but as soon as I got in the car I was happy as Larry then again I had a really fit instructor
did you choose her because of that?
no she's not chose me more than anything no just the luck of the draw
my driving instructor wasn't fit he was the dad of one of my friends from high school so is that? What else I don't like? I don't like sand I don't like beaches I'm really miserable aren't I?
I like sand I like snow I like beaches I like mountains
I like mountains and waterfalls and like countryside things
I don't really like cities though
no I don't like cities I don't like like I don't like London surprise surprise I don't like something
nobody likes London up north
no it's too busy and it's really dirty and people are rude it's really expensive and it just feels rubbish proper manky
I think it is quite manky
I'd much prefer being like countryside way em

see that's what I like about Manchester you got a little bit of the city and then you've got the countryside right on the doorstep you don't have to go far or you can just look outside the actual city boundaries and pretty much any

yeah yeah that's what I like about where I live cos it's nearer to Bolton but like really near the west Pennine moors like there's all like farm fields up next to my housing estate and stuff so it's a lot nicer but I'm definite close to the motorway to get to like the seaside and stuff

see that's what I think you should do with have a big ocean and Manchester's got a beach seaside just go go up like towards that Busby way and you get to the top there and then like where all that would be just stop it all flooding nice big sea we'd have a beach and everything would be great
who was it that said was it Ian Brown? Did he say that the only thing missing from Manchester is a beach so like like bomb Liverpool or something so the
Liverpool is a bit too far away I think he was just being anti-scouser there I say just flood a lot easier
I'm half from my dad's from
yeah but you're from over that way somewhere aren't you? Quay it wouldn't affect you flooding the quays
yeah I don't live in now cos my mum doesn't live in she's s snob

plus the bit which would be flooded s only like where the Lowry is and all you know media city they're not important and the houses which are there are just full of scumbags so that's not important you don't even have to tell them we're flooding it just
just get rid of them through
brick them in and flood the place
what are the nice places I think it's really close to get to like north Wales and stuff like that
yeah
not that there's anything in
no but I like they've got at the end of the pier they've got like this amusement thing that's like all the amusements and you em and thingy you get
no but it's all tokens now you can't just pay you got to buy all these tokens just to go on all the rides
yeah but they're old pennies so it's the whole feel of it like being kind of I don't know Victorian or whatever
they're not old pennies they're just tokens last time I went
the one at the end of the peer?
yeah
they were pennies last time I went like
when was that?
not long ago last year
I've been last year and it was tokens
I think they were pennies old pennies

I didn't get any so I wouldn't know he just said oh you've got to get tokens so I said ooh sod that but it's the same at you can't just you used to be able to go and pay just for one particular ride now it's all tokens and
I've been to the on the rides at for ages about eight years
yeah I fell out of them when they got rid of the and put in the em some stupid fan yeah some Viking ride
is that that
yeah something like that
I went on that the boat sank not cos I was in it it just sank anyway

we went on it and it was like everyone was buying all those you know rain things to keep you dry me and my mate just went on there we go a little bit wet so all we did was went to the pub which is right next to it and sat in the sun and dried off instead of paying two pound for a piece of plastic that you can get in Benidorm or something for thirty P
yeah see when I went with my sister it was raining all day anyway so we were absolutely soaking so sinking on the ride wasn't any different but the queues were deal quick went on
that suddenly reminds me of that the ride it's the Ma Mouse which was basically you just got on this like boat sort of thing and it just went around on a track inside these caves
oh yeah
I've only been on it once and not great
it was just a boat wasn't it? Wasn't anything exciting no I used to I used to really like the log flute and the big one and the mouse one
bad mouse
I never felt safe on it though
what the mad mouse?
no
no? People have died on that
have they?
yeah
oh I didn't know that
it's only like rickety wooden things and before health and safety became a big issue yeah people used to come that
I didn't know that is the Grand National still there?
I used to like that I like the big big one whatever it's called is it called the big one?
we used to call it Pepsi Max big lift
oh yeah they didn't they?
t's alright I've never been on the front and that's where you want to be really on the form
I think I'll on one like that
I think that's still there but the wo the woman who eh thingy she's sold it now the one who used to own it
oh has she cos it was family a family owned thing
mm
she died she was very old
yeah
I was there once and seeing her in a big Rolls Royce
it's the only thing worth going to in Blackpool really
there's the tower
I've never been up the tower
should do it's good
is it? Oh and the lights the lights are good
well they don't have the circus there anymore
no
by the tower which is a shame
